attributes.action: ALLOW EXPATS TO BE ABLE TO ENJOY THE SAME ANNUAL PENSION INCREASES AS PENSIONERS WHO REMAIN IN THE U.K.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: EXPATS MOVE OVERSEAS FOR MANY REASONS, I BELIEVE MOSTLY TO A WARMER CLIMATE - WHY IS IT THAT HAVING PAID PENSION CONTRIBUTIONS FOR AN ENTIRE WORKING LIFE A PENSIONER WHO DECIDES TO MOVE ABROAD IS EXPECTED BY THE U.K. GOV. TO SURVIVE FOR THEIR REMAINING YEARS ON THE PENSION FROZEN AT THE TIME THEY LEAVE.- IT CAUSES A GREAT DEAL OF BITTERNESS WHEN PEOPLE WHO HAVE PAID NOTHING INTO THE SYSTEM CAN CLAIM AN INCREASING PENSION UNTILL THEIR DEMISE. - IT IS ABOUT TIME THAT THE U.K GOV. STARTED CARING MORE ABOUT ITS INDIGENOUS PEOPLE . SEE WHAT HAS HAPPENNED TO THE ECONOMY BY THROWING MONEY AWAY TO NON BRITISH , IT CERTAINLY HAS NOT HELPED . WE OLD FOLK DESERVE MORE IN OUR REMAINING YEARS. IT IS OUR HUMAN RIGHT , OR DOES THAT NOT APPLY TO US.

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
